'''''Golden Gliding License''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to [[gliding|glide]] a long distance in one go.

==Trivia==
* The name {{Lang|"Golden Gliding License"|zh=金牌飞行执照}} is a reference to the quest series of the game ''{{w|Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas}}'', which players can get gold medals for flight school challenges.
